name: Astrologer’s Shop
description: A small, obscure astrologer’s shop in Cassandra, known locally for fortune-telling and esoteric services. The shop contributes to the town’s atmosphere of superstition and unease, though concrete information about its inner workings is limited.

snapshot.name: Astrologer’s Shop
snapshot.description: The shop is modest in size and filled with occult decorations typical of a fortune-teller’s business. Incense, charts, and esoteric symbols dominate the space, creating an unsettling yet ambiguous environment. The location hints at deeper occult currents in the town, but little is openly revealed.

conditions.description: Dim, atmospheric interior lighting, dominated by candles or low lamps.
The lingering scent of incense and herbs.

exits.description: The main entrance leading back to the surrounding streets of Cassandra.

snapshot.keeperNotes: The astrologer’s shop serves primarily as atmospheric reinforcement of Cassandra’s occult undercurrents. If needed, the Keeper may use it as a place to foreshadow mythos elements or redirect investigators toward other locations, but no fixed revelations are required here.
